title: nova api show ips of instance

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ppyy

comments.content: The 'private' container actually just gets its name from the label of the network you set up. The real design flaw here is that we can't tell which ips are floating and which aren't from the objects within the container.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
